pageTitle: Re: Can Pentax make A Decent Lens? Ricoh have not fixed QC issues...: Pentax SLR Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Cheers Trevor G Silkypix tutorials at: http://photo.computerwyse.com The majority had more DOF (sometimes twice as much or even more) on one side than the other but in many cases it was also skewed so that at maximum aperture one side could never be in focus if the centre and other side were. Many of the primes I had previously were also skewed. There is no front element to sag in a prime like there is in an extending zoom. -- hide signature --
